summary: So apparently this popular phan acc girl named Lemon(?) said she was pregnant and legit was gonna name her kid Daniel Phillip or...
body: So apparently this popular phan acc girl named Lemon(?) said she was pregnant and legit was gonna name her kid Daniel Phillip or Phillip Daniel or some shit (wheeze). She even met up irl with her gc friends and did a gender reveal with them and dan and phil at the ii m&g. But the shit is that eventually when she “had her baby” her friends wanted to see it but she would always send shitty quality pics and cancel plans last minute and would never really show her kid so it’s all suspicious and shit. According to her her kid was born around the time ii ended and was premature. Many people, even some of her friends claim and suspect the kid’s all fake and that she just did it for attention. (Also i heard some shit about dnp mentioning the m&g but not her name n she got all butthurt n shit? Im not too sure tho but anyways, thats the tea)🐸☕

According to her her kid was born around the time ii ended and was premature. Many people, even some of her friends claim and suspect the kid’s all fake and that she just did it for attention. (Also i heard some shit about dnp mentioning the m&g but not her name n she got all butthurt n shit? Im not too sure tho but anyways, thats the tea)🐸☕

But the shit is that eventually when she “had her baby” her friends wanted to see it but she would always send shitty quality pics and cancel plans last minute and would never really show her kid so it’s all suspicious and shit. According to her her kid was born around the time ii ended and was premature. Many people, even some of her friends claim and suspect the kid’s all fake and that she just did it for attention. (Also i heard some shit about dnp mentioning the m&g but not her name n she got all butthurt n shit? Im not too sure tho but anyways, thats the tea)🐸☕

She even met up irl with her gc friends and did a gender reveal with them and dan and phil at the ii m&g. But the shit is that eventually when she “had her baby” her friends wanted to see it but she would always send shitty quality pics and cancel plans last minute and would never really show her kid so it’s all suspicious and shit. blog.description: My name's Dylan (they/them) and this is where I shove all my bullshit. Mainly it's those curly haired gay men (pictured above) and shitposts so if you're into those things then here ya go. I don't trust you all with the url of my one directon sideblog but it's out there. Header by @lemonheadlester.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

tags: sorry for the ramble im just feeling sappy
summary: a difference I’ve noticed between when they had the fringes and now is that they seemed to use that as almost a defense...
body:
a difference I’ve noticed between when they had the fringes and now is that they seemed to use that as almost a defense mechanism. like ‘oh yeah, we’re Dan and Phil, we’re just two bros with the matching fringes!’

when they changed their hair that kind of fell away. like the way they interact with each other and with us is totally different now and I can’t believe it’s unrelated. their hair was so attached to their respective branding and when they let that fall away, they let some of their defenses down too. things feel more natural and less like a gimmick and their genuine happiness radiates from them.

summary: in the darkness, with you - chapter 19: different
title: in the darkness, with you - chapter 19: different
body:
Read from the start: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36415200

Read chapter 19:
https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/38118074

This fic is COMPLETE and will be posted twice a week (Sun/Thurs)!

THANK YOU to my amazing beta @insectbah  ❤️

Summary:
Phil, 28, video editor.
Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Phil’s wish does come true, but there’s a catch.
It doesn’t mean anything.

Excerpt from chapter 19:
“So you’ve never had like, a one night stand? Or—or something like we have now?” Dan asks him with caution in his voice.
Phil has to hold back a snort.
“No, Dan, of course not,” he replies easily, but his heart is still beating faster than just a minute ago. “Have you?”
“Not really,” Dan admits to Phil’s surprise. “I mean, never to this extent.”
